name: Memory-NoVisuals
description:
This gamewas made for Trijam 27 that should be made in 3 hours. I made the game in more than 3 hours (about 5h). This is one of the 'finished' projects i made. This game was made in Unity.

In the game you can choose how many letters(from the keyboard) you want the computer to say(No patterns, chosen randomly) from 1-15 , then you hear one letter after another and write them in the exact same order (one at a time).  You need to confirm with Enter button. You get one letter wrong, you fail, so you need to get every letter correct.

 The one thing i am mad - after you write the letter, you have to delete it manually(i tried many things, and didn't want to try with deleting and creating the input field in-game by scripting. I wanted to finish as quickly as i could after the 3h passed).
